content.en: Power flow analysis: Researchers have been using algorithms to address various research questions related to power flow in AC/DC distribution systems. These algorithms are employed to analyze equations, calculate power flow, and solve load flow problems in hybrid AC/DC grids. They also help in achieving convergence, considering practical restrictions, and handling different control strategies.
content.da: Strømningsanalyse: Forskere har brugt algoritmer til at besvare forskellige forskningsspørgsmål relateret til strømflow i AC/DC distributionssystemer. Disse algoritmer anvendes til at analysere ligninger, beregne strømflow og løse lastflowproblemer i hybride AC/DC netværk. De hjælper også med at opnå konvergens, tage praktiske begrænsninger i betragtning og håndtere forskellige kontrolstrategier.
